index.name: angularjs
index.subtitle: AngularJS
index.about: AngularJS is a toolset for building the framework most suited to your application development. It is fully extensible and works well with other libraries. Every feature can be modified or replaced to suit your unique development workflow and feature needs.

books.title: AngularJS Succinctly
books.description: Perform common tasks and overcome common problems in Angular.js.
books.author: Frederik Dietz

books.title: AngularJS in 60 Minutes
books.description: AngularJS Fundamentals in 60 Minutes is going to go through all of the key fundamentals you need to know about the AngularJS SPA framework.
books.author: Dan Wahlin

books.title: Practical AngularJS
books.description: Real-world examples of using AngularJS in multiple scenarios and platforms (KarmaJS, Firebase, Eclipse, WebStorm, O2 Platform)
books.author: Dinis Cruz

books.title: Recipes with Angular.js
books.description: Practical concepts and techniques for rapid web application development.
books.author: Frederik Dietz
